__TOC__

This page keeps track of the current release status of the Mobile Team.

=== Summary ===

* uboot postponed; after review we decided to keep redboot for imx until bugs are fixed upstream
* marvel dove + thumb2 hangs: ongoing work
* lightweight browser: chromium-browser and firefox 3.6 in the archive
* first lsb lib-test run; raw results available on wiki page
* thumb2 review finished and outstanding porting bugs filed.

==== Image Status ====
* general: image productionbroken by mono (Bug:514215) and crashes by gvfs (Bug:512959)
* imx51: in good shape.
* dove: not in good shape (thumb2 board hangs - Bug:504880 and Bug:505772)

https://blueprints.launchpad.net/ubuntu/lucid/+specs?searchtext=mobile-lucid

=== RC Bugs ===

Fixed this week:
* Bug:490792: xulrunner-1.9.1: ARM/Thumb interworking support missing from nanojit
* Bug:511197: busybox: "must be built with -marm for lucid on armel"
* Bug:456659: linux-fsl-imx51: suspend/resume failure on imx51

Triaged problems:
* Bug:514215: mono: "mono ftbfs with thumb2 on armel"

Removed from RC list this week:
* Bug:506761: uboot-imx "lucid uboot hangs on fatload uImage on fsl TO2 TO2.5 and TO3"
* Bug:507887: uboot-imx "NIC not properly initialized in uboot code" 

Bugs which need better understanding/debugging:
* Bug:499881: linux-fsl-imx51 "usb storage with ext4 does not work in lucid" 
* Bug:504880: linux-mvl-dove "[dove] possibility of thumb2 instructions invalidly being handled"
* Bug:505772: linux-mvl-dove "system freezes sometimes after X is up for a while"
* Bug:512959: gvfs/nautilus "nautilus assert failure: *** stack smashing detected ***"
